column4: lets first talk here, there might be other people interested in your problem, or they may know more about it than I do
i`ve compiled kernel,but don`t know how to add in the rub,so that i could boot from it
i`ve downloaded kgrub editor,but it doesn`t load
I cannot help you, sorry. I've never compiled a new kernel myself
ok.thx anyway
you should try to phrase the question better. like "i've compiled a kernel, but how can i add it to grub"
that way there's a better chance people will help you
i've compiled a kernel, but how can i add it to grub??? :) p.s. sorry i`m noob in english:)
dont ask me ;) Its just that if you are more specific, people will help you better.
nevermind...i`ll try for my self to edit it:)hacker.....:)))
ok, good luck! Make a backup of your menu.lst file ;)
i don`t use to make backup`s :))))
double good luck in that case ;)
thx....will reboot now to see what i`ve done:)))
nope....doesn`t work:(
where are you form? maybe people in your local ubuntu channel can help you
nope:)don`t think so:)i`m from Moldova...guess you`ve never heard about this country:)
well I've heard about that country, but not about an ubuntu channel there ;)
you`ve heard about moldova????wear:)))))where are you from?gues that europe:)
yes, holland/netherlands
lucky for you:)
